languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс продолжает перечислять способы, которыми разыскивал вас — и вдруг оказывается прямо перед вами. Взгляд, устремленный на вас, тлеет едва сдерживаемым огнем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс продолжает перечислять способы, которыми разыскивал вас по всему Простору Коронус — и вдруг оказывается прямо перед вами, так близко, что вы подаетесь назад, упираясь в свой собственный письменный стол. Взгляд, устремленный на вас, тлеет едва сдерживаемым огнем.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс продолжает перечислять способы, которыми разыскивал вас — и вдруг оказывается прямо перед вами. Взгляд, устремленный на вас, тлеет едва сдерживаемым огнем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}
{n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}
{n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}
{n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希继续说着他是如何用了各种各样的手段，试图找到你。突然之间，他站在了你面前。他的双眼紧紧地盯着你，眼中燃烧着着难以压抑的烈焰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希继续说着他是如何用了各种各样的手段，试图找到你。突然之间，他站在了你面前。他的双眼紧紧地盯着你，眼中燃烧着着难以压抑的烈焰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sigue enumerando los métodos con los que intentó encontrarte hasta que de pronto lo tienes delante. Te mira fijamente con un fuego apenas contenido en los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sigue enumerando los métodos con los que intentó encontrarte hasta que de pronto lo tienes delante. Te mira fijamente con un fuego apenas contenido en los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたを見つけるために使った手段を列挙し続け、突然、あなたの目の前に立った。あなたを見つめるその目は、どうにか抑えてきた炎で輝いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたを見つけるために使った手段を列挙し続け、突然、あなたの目の前に立った。あなたを見つめるその目は、どうにか抑えてきた炎で輝いていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous liste méthodiquement tout ce qu'il a fait pour vous retrouver. Lorsqu'enfin il termine son énumération, il se tient juste devant vous, les yeux brûlant d'une ardeur qu'il semble peiner à contenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous liste méthodiquement tout ce qu'il a fait pour vous retrouver. Lorsqu'enfin il termine son énumération, il se tient juste devant vous, les yeux brûlant d'une ardeur qu'il semble peiner à contenir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix berichtet weiter von den Methoden, mit denen er versucht hat dich zu finden – und auf einmal steht er direkt vor dir. Seine Augen sind auf dich fixiert und funkeln vor ungebändigtem Feuer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix berichtet weiter von den Methoden, mit denen er versucht hat dich zu finden – und auf einmal steht er direkt vor dir. Seine Augen sind auf dich fixiert und funkeln vor ungebändigtem Feuer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, seni bulmak için denediği yöntemleri sıralamaya devam ediyor ve aniden tam önünde beliriyor. Sana kilitlenen bakışları, zar zor dizginleyebildiği bir hararetle parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix continues listing the methods he used to try to find you — and suddenly he is standing right in front of you. His eyes, locked on you, glint with barely restrained fire.{/n}
